sources.title: Seven Doors to Death
sources.description: Title: Seven Doors to Death Summary: A shot rings out in a darkened apartment; a woman screams and flees, tricking architect Jimmy McMillan into giving her a ride. McMillan returns and finds a body; but the police find a ... Directed by: Elmer Clifton Actors: Chick Chandler, June Clyde, George Meeker Production Company: Alexander-Stern Productions Release Date: 16 August 1944 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A shot rings out in a darkened apartment; a woman screams and flees, tricking architect Jimmy McMillan into giving her a ride. McMillan returns and finds a body; but the police find a different body! He and the woman in question (Mary Rawlins, niece of the late owner), both suspects, become allies; among light romantic banter they hunt the real killer behind the seven doors of a blind alley, housing eccentric suspects and a dark, intricate, spooky cellar...

sources.title: Seven Doors to Death

sources.title: Seven Doors to Death (1944)
sources.description: An architect (Chick Chandler) studies the doors of six shops and an apartment house to solve a gem theft/double murder. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/seven-doors-to-death-1944/

sources.title: Seven Doors to Death (1944) MYSTERY
sources.description:
Stars: Chick Chandler, June Clyde, George Meeker
Writer/Director: Elmer Clifton

A shot rings out in a darkened apartment; a woman screams and flees, tricking architect Jimmy McMillan into giving her a ride. McMillan returns and finds a body; but the police find a different body! He and the woman in question (Mary Rawlins, niece of the late owner), both suspects, become allies; among light romantic banter they hunt the real killer behind the seven doors of a blind alley, housing eccentric suspects and a dark, intricate, spooky cellar.
